content: GParams | Jenkins pluginGParamsHow to installDocumentationReleasesIssuesDependenciesHealth Score Introduction This plugin allow any Pipeline Jobs store and read values common for all jobs. It adds 2 steps in pipeline: gpRead(name, value) gpWrite(name) Getting started Use of the steps is very simple. For write value in global store add follow step: gpWrite name: 'myvalue', value: 'Some string' For read this value add follow: def myval = gpRead name: 'myvalue' LICENSE Licensed under MIT, see LICENSE Version: 64.v0422ef148e18Released: 3 days agoRequires Jenkins 2.479.3ID: global-pipeline-parametersNo usage data availableLinksGitHubOpen issues (Jira)Report an issue (Jira)Pipeline Step ReferenceJavadocLabelsThis plugin has no labelsMaintainersOleg GavrilchenkoHelp us improve this page!To propose a change submit a pull request to the plugin page on GitHub.
title: GParams | Jenkins plugin
